org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

Class SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O extends SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStream<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    OUT - Output type of the operator.
    O - Type of the operator.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataStreamSink, DataStreamSource, IterativeDataStream, StreamCrossOperator.CrossWindow, StreamJoinOperator.JoinedStream

    public class SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O extends SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O>>
extends DataStream<OUT>
    The SingleOutputStreamOperator represents a user defined transformation applied on a DataStream with one predefined output type.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStream

        counter, degreeOfParallelism, environment, id, jobGraphBuilder, mergedStreams, partitioner, selectAll, typeInfo, userDefinedNames

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> broadcast()
      Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are broadcasted to every parallel instance of the next component.
      SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> copy()
      Creates a copy of the DataStream
      SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> distribute()
      Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are distributed evenly to the next component.This setting only effects the how the outputs will be distributed between the parallel instances of the next processing operator.
      SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> forward()
      Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are forwarded to the local subtask of the next component (whenever possible).
      protected SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> registerState(Map<String,OperatorState<?>> states)
      This is a beta feature

      Register operator states for this operator provided in a map.

      This is a beta feature

      Register an operator state for this operator by the given name.

      Sets the maximum time frequency (ms) for the flushing of the output buffer.

      Sets the degree of parallelism for this operator.

        Overrides:

      • setParallelism

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> setParallelism(int dop)
        Sets the degree of parallelism for this operator. The degree must be 1 or more.
        Parameters:
        dop - The degree of parallelism for this operator.
        Returns:
        The operator with set degree of parallelism.

      • setBufferTimeout

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> setBufferTimeout(long timeoutMillis)
        Sets the maximum time frequency (ms) for the flushing of the output buffer. By default the output buffers flush only when they are full.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - The maximum time between two output flushes.
        Returns:
        The operator with buffer timeout set.

      • split

        public SplitDataStream<OUT> split(OutputSelector<OUT> outputSelector)
        Operator used for directing tuples to specific named outputs using an OutputSelector. Calling this method on an operator creates a new SplitDataStream.
        Parameters:
        outputSelector - The user defined OutputSelector for directing the tuples.
        Returns:
        The SplitDataStream

      • registerState

        protected SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> registerState(String name,
                                              OperatorState<?> state)
        This is a beta feature

        Register an operator state for this operator by the given name. This name can be used to retrieve the state during runtime using StreamingRuntimeContext.getState(String). To obtain the StreamingRuntimeContext from the user-defined function use the RichFunction.getRuntimeContext() method.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the operator state.
        state - The state to be registered for this name.
        Returns:
        The data stream with state registered.

      • registerState

        protected SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> registerState(Map<String,OperatorState<?>> states)
        This is a beta feature

        Register operator states for this operator provided in a map. The registered states can be retrieved during runtime using StreamingRuntimeContext.getState(String). To obtain the StreamingRuntimeContext from the user-defined function use the RichFunction.getRuntimeContext() method.
        Parameters:
        states - The map containing the states that will be registered.
        Returns:
        The data stream with states registered.

      • broadcast

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> broadcast()
        Description copied from class: DataStream
        Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are broadcasted to every parallel instance of the next component. This setting only effects the how the outputs will be distributed between the parallel instances of the next processing operator.
        Overrides:
        broadcast in class DataStream<OUT>
        Returns:
        The DataStream with broadcast partitioning set.

      • shuffle

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> shuffle()
        Description copied from class: DataStream
        Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are shuffled to the next component. This setting only effects the how the outputs will be distributed between the parallel instances of the next processing operator.
        Overrides:
        shuffle in class DataStream<OUT>
        Returns:
        The DataStream with shuffle partitioning set.

      • forward

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> forward()
        Description copied from class: DataStream
        Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are forwarded to the local subtask of the next component (whenever possible). This is the default partitioner setting. This setting only effects the how the outputs will be distributed between the parallel instances of the next processing operator.
        Overrides:
        forward in class DataStream<OUT>
        Returns:
        The DataStream with shuffle partitioning set.

      • distribute

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> distribute()
        Description copied from class: DataStream
        Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are distributed evenly to the next component.This setting only effects the how the outputs will be distributed between the parallel instances of the next processing operator.
        Overrides:
        distribute in class DataStream<OUT>
        Returns:
        The DataStream with shuffle partitioning set.
